t: Praise{H1984}{(H8761)} ye the LORD{H3050}. I will praise{H3034}{(H8686)} the LORD{H3068} with my whole heart{H3824}, in the assembly{H5475} of the upright{H3477}, and in the congregation{H5712}.
The works{H4639} of the LORD{H3068} are great{H1419}, sought out{H1875}{(H8803)} of all them that have pleasure{H2656} therein.
His work{H6467} is honourable{H1935} and glorious{H1926}: and his righteousness{H6666} endureth{H5975}{(H8802)} for ever{H5703}.
He hath made{H6213}{(H8804)} his wonderful works{H6381}{(H8737)} to be remembered{H2143}: the LORD{H3068} is gracious{H2587} and full of compassion{H7349}.
He hath given{H5414}{(H8804)} meat{H2964} unto them that fear{H3373} him: he will ever{H5769} be mindful{H2142}{(H8799)} of his covenant{H1285}.
He hath shewed{H5046}{(H8689)} his people{H5971} the power{H3581} of his works{H4639}, that he may give{H5414}{(H8800)} them the heritage{H5159} of the heathen{H1471}.
The works{H4639} of his hands{H3027} are verity{H571} and judgment{H4941}; all his commandments{H6490} are sure{H539}{(H8737)}.
They stand fast{H5564}{(H8803)} for ever{H5703} and ever{H5769}, and are done{H6213}{(H8803)} in truth{H571} and uprightness{H3477}.
He sent{H7971}{(H8804)} redemption{H6304} unto his people{H5971}: he hath commanded{H6680}{(H8765)} his covenant{H1285} for ever{H5769}: holy{H6918} and reverend{H3372}{(H8737)} is his name{H8034}.

The fear{H3374} of the LORD{H3068} is the beginning{H7225} of wisdom{H2451}: a good{H2896} understanding{H7922} have all they that do{H6213}{(H8802)} his commandments: his praise{H8416} endureth{H5975}{(H8802)} for ever{H5703}.
